name: Downtown Graphic Crew Neck Men's Tee
description: PRODUCT STORY Show the world you care about the only home we have with this Downtown Graphic Crew Neck Men's Tee. Featuring a chest panel inspired by nature, this relaxed-fit tee can be paired with slim black jeans (roll up the cuffs) and a chunky wooden necklace for a dressed-down look that still manages to catch the eye. More power to the planet. FEATURES & BENEFITS Contains Recycled Material: Made with recycled fibers. One of PUMA's answers to reduce our environmental impact. DETAILS Relaxed fit for optimum comfortRibbed crew neckGraphic front panelWoven PUMA Archive No. 1 Logo at lower back hemEmbroidered PUMA Graphic on upper back

name: Downtown Graphic Men's Hoodie
description: PRODUCT STORY Utility, environment and urban flair: That's this Downtown Graphic Men's Hoodie in a nutshell. PUMA is spelled out on the chest in elements inspired by nature for a look that shows the world what matters to you. The relaxed fit means you can throw it on just before you head out the door. Is it cold out there? Put up the hood, pull the drawstring tight – and tell people you're going "burrito chic" today. FEATURES & BENEFITS Contains Recycled Material: Made with recycled fibers. One of PUMA's answers to reduce our environmental impact. DETAILS Relaxed fit for more versatilityHood with drawcord for an adjustable silhouetteKangaroo pocketsRibbed cuffs and hemAll-over colourblocked designEmbroidered PUMA graphic badge on chestWoven PUMA Archive No. 1 Logo on lower back hem

name: MMQ Seersucker Shirt Jacket
description: PRODUCT STORY German for "Made with Quality," our “Macht’s mit Qualität” collection represents the finest in PUMA designs and materials. Featuring minimalist aesthetics, contemporary silhouettes and a keen eye for detail, it's a line rooted in luxury. Crafted from conscious cotton fabrics, with a relaxed fit, ergonomic construction, stand-up collar, snap button closure, welt pockets for storage and elegantly embroidered brand elements, this trend-setting jacket will have you looking sleek in seersucker. FEATURES & BENEFITS Contains Recycled Material: Made with recycled fibers. One of PUMA's answers to reduce our environmental impact. DETAILS Relaxed fitStand-up collar with full snap button closureSide welt pockets plus a zipped welt chest pocketElasticated cuffs and hem with cotton-looped drawcords for an adjustable fitErgonomic construction with darts for better movementHanger loop insideFlag label on sideEmbroidered PUMA Cat Logo

name: Downtown Colourblocked Men's Hoodie
description: PRODUCT STORY More versatile than a chameleon, the humble hoodie can be dressed up, dressed down and dressed to perfection. This relaxed-fit piece stands out thanks to its all-over colourblocked design. Pair it with a shearling-collar denim jacket, black jeans and boots on cold days, or box-fresh sneakers and sim-fit joggers for an on-point athleisurewear look. FEATURES & BENEFITS Contains Recycled Material: Made with recycled fibers. One of PUMA's answers to reduce our environmental impact. name: Blaze of Glory Deep South Trainers
description: PRODUCT STORY Ignite interest no matter where you go with our Blaze of Glory Trainers, a sleek design that's sure to turn heads from the gym to the streets and everywhere in between. This eye-catching design is a reimagining of classic PUMA silhouettes and colour stories from the '90s. Paired with our legendary trinomic cushioning and comfortable stride, these shoes are the next new sensation. Our Blaze of Glory Deep South Trainers are inspired by travellers taking a journey down south and feature a warm, sun-drenched palette drawn from the colours of the Tuscan sun and the lightweight stride of an injection-moulded EVA midsole. FEATURES & BENEFITS IMEVA: PUMA's material for a lightweight and comfortable feel DETAILS Low boot constructionTextile upper with leather and suede cage overlaysIMEVA midsoleRubber outsoleMesh collar and tongueLace closure with metal tipsLeather tongue label with debossed and printed PUMA Wordmark and PUMA Cat Logo and MMQ logo

name: Downtown Twill Tapered Men's Pants
description: PRODUCT STORY Slim is out, tapered is in: Style doesn't stop for anyone, which is why you have to be on top of your wardrobe game at all times if you're going to keep up. These pants, which feature a woven fabric design with needle-stitch cut lines, come in a relaxed, tapered fit with open hems – for that effortless '90s feel. And if you want to tighten up the silhouette a little, the external drawcord in the elastic waistband is all you need. FEATURES & BENEFITS Contains Recycled Material: Made with recycled fibers. One of PUMA's answers to reduce our environmental impact. DETAILS Relaxed fit with open hemsSide pockets and patch back pocketElastic waistband with external drawcordNeedle-stitch cut lineEmbroidered PUMA graphic badgeWoven PUMA Archive No. 1 Logo on back pocket

name: Downtown Men's Shorts
description: PRODUCT STORY No skipping leg day: Welcome to thigh guy summer. Show off your pins in these cotton-blend Downtown Men's Shorts – with an inseam length of 8 inches. The all-over colour-blocked print and needle-stitch cut line set these shorts apart in the sartorial stakes. They're as comfortable as you like, too, thanks to the elastic waistband with external drawcord. Need to put your wallet and phone somewhere? There's a side pocket and back pocket for that. name: Infuse Woven Women's Jacket
description: PRODUCT STORY Say hello to your new favourite outer layer.
